definition[0]: someone who is fortunate has something good happen to them, or is in a good situation
example[0]: We’ve been more fortunate than a lot of farmers.
example[1]: I’ve been fortunate to find a career that I love.
example[2]: I was fortunate enough to obtain a research studentship at Stanford.
example[3]: She felt fortunate in being able to please herself where she lived.
example[4]: I’m fortunate that I have such an understanding wife.
definition[1]: a fortunate event is one in which something good happens by chance, especially when this saves you from trouble or danger
example[5]: By a fortunate coincidence, a passer-by heard her cries for help.
